CHAT.comment: ALTRIA GROUP, INC., ET AL. Petitioners v. STEPHANIE GOOD, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS HALLWARD-DRIEMEIER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
